Abstract: This evaluation of the effectiveness of the participant training program in Taiwan was based on written and oral interviews with 172 returned participants and on discussions with supervisors. Recommendations are made on training design, selection procedures, pre-departure preparation, and English language training.  (Author abstract, modified)
Inst_Author: 004306 - U.S. Dept. of State. Foreign Operations Administration. Mutual Security Mission to China
Title: Evaluation of TA program in Taiwan : a firsthand inquiry of returned TA participants, as secured from the participants themselves and from their employers and supervisors
